wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Thomas Gage  (14 December 1871 – 21 January 1945) was a Scottish botanist and surgeon in the Indian Medical Service who worked at the Calcutta Botanical Garden.

response: *Andrew Thomas Gage (1871–1945), Scottish botanist and surgeon
